tasks.description: Error Handling Framework - Centralized error handling and logging for all application components
Authentication Module - User login and session management with JWT tokens
Product Catalog - Core product listing, search, and filtering functionality
Shopping Cart - Add/remove items, quantity management, and cart persistence
Payment Integration - Stripe, PayPal, and Klarna payment gateway integration
Order Management - Order creation, status tracking, and fulfillment workflow
User Profile - Profile management, address book, and order history
Search and Filtering - Advanced product search with filters and sorting
Inventory Management - Real-time stock tracking and low-stock alerts
Email Notifications - Order confirmation, shipment, and promotional emails
Admin Dashboard - Analytics, order management, and product administration
User Reviews and Ratings - Product reviews with star ratings and moderation
Wishlist Feature - Save favorite products for later purchase
Promotional Codes - Coupon and discount code system with validation
Shipping Integration - Real-time shipping quotes and carrier integration
Return Management - Return request processing and refund handling
Product Recommendations - AI-powered personalized product suggestions
Multi-language Support - Internationalization for multiple languages
Mobile Responsive Design - Fully responsive mobile experience
Performance Optimization - Image optimization, lazy loading, and caching
Analytics Integration - Google Analytics and conversion tracking
SEO Optimization - Meta tags, structured data, and sitemap generation
Customer Support Chat - Live chat integration with support team
Social Media Integration - Product sharing and social login
Subscription Management - Recurring billing and subscription products
Security Audit - Security testing and vulnerability assessment
Database Optimization - Query optimization and indexing strategy
Load Testing - Performance testing under load and stress testing
Documentation - API documentation and developer guides
Final Integration Testing - End-to-end testing and go-live preparation
Metrics dashboard implementation - Real-time KPI dashboard displaying throughput, latency, error rates, and user engagement metrics with customizable widgets
Distributed Redis cache layer - Multi-node Redis cluster with replication, failover, and cache invalidation strategies
OAuth 2.0 + OpenID Connect + RBAC - Multi-provider OAuth integration with OpenID Connect and fine-grained role-based access control
Horizontal scaling for Next.js frontend - Multi-instance deployment with load balancing and auto-scaling policies
API gateway layer (Kong/Traefik) - Request routing, authentication delegation, rate limiting, and API versioning
Centralized logging (ELK/Splunk) - Aggregated logging from all services with full-text search and log analytics
Next.js build optimization - Tree shaking, code splitting, minification, and bundle analysis
End-to-end encryption + HTTPS hardening - TLS 1.3 enforcement, certificate pinning, and encryption at rest
Backend Go services scaling - Stateless service design with horizontal scaling and graceful shutdown
Service mesh (Istio/Linkerd) - Traffic management, security policies, and observability across services
Distributed tracing (OpenTelemetry) - End-to-end request tracing across microservices with context propagation
CDN edge caching - Global content delivery with edge caching and cache purging strategies
Comprehensive audit logging - User action tracking, API call logging, and compliance audit trails
Database horizontal scaling - Sharding strategy, distributed transactions, and data replication
Circuit breaker pattern - Fault tolerance with circuit breakers, bulkheads, and retry logic
Alerting system with thresholds - Prometheus alerting rules with escalation policies and incident management
Database query optimization - Query plan analysis, index optimization, and slow query identification
Security hardening (CSP, HSTS, SRI) - Content Security Policy, HSTS headers, and Subresource Integrity
Message queue system (RabbitMQ/Kafka) - Asynchronous processing with message brokers and event-driven architecture
API rate limiting (token bucket) - Rate limiting implementation with token bucket algorithm and quota management
Custom event tracking - Application event tracking for business intelligence and funnel analysis
API endpoint response caching - Intelligent caching of API responses with conditional request support
GDPR/CCPA compliance framework - Data privacy controls, consent management, and right-to-be-forgotten
Distributed session management - Session replication, sticky sessions, and session persistence
API request/response caching at gateway - Gateway-level caching for reduced backend load
Analytics reporting + forecasting - Advanced reporting dashboards with trend analysis and forecasting models
Client-side offline-first architecture - Service workers, local caching, and progressive enhancement
Web Application Firewall (WAF) - DDoS protection, SQL injection prevention, and XSS filtering
Cross-region failover + DR - Multi-region deployment with automatic failover and disaster recovery
API gateway monitoring + observability - Gateway metrics, request/response analytics, error tracking, and SLA monitoring

summary: Phase 4 implementation: 6-week sprint with 30 core features spanning authentication, e-commerce, admin tools, and customer experience. Phase 5 infrastructure: 6-week sprint with 30 advanced tasks across analytics, performance, security, scaling, and API patterns.
